channel.title: I need help finding a program -
channel.description:
Hey guys, its me Kozs... Anyways...
I need a program that allows you to automatically hold down the left click button on your mouse. Like Gary Hoods Auto Clicker.. But instead of Clicking. Holding it down. Not clicking.
Thanks

item.title: I need help finding a program -
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I still don’t see how you would make it not let go of pressing.

Read full topic

item.description:

I’m sure it’s possible but I am unsure of how it would be done.

item.title: I need help finding a program -
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Fridder:

I usually just take a rubber band and put it around my mouse, or flip it upside down and put a heavy object on it. I don’t know of any programs though.

Im using a fucking fuck thing of a Laptop though. and items U have in mind for that I might actually…

I got nothing D:

Read full topic
